vclaim: Werner Herzog said: "Dear America: You are waking up as Germany once did, to the awareness that 1/3 of your people would kill another 1/3, while 1/3 watches."
title: Did Werner Herzog Tweet America Is ‘Waking Up, As Germany Once Did’?
subtitle: We know this much: The German film director isn't the biggest fan of social media.
author: Dan Evon
